fields.name: Notes
fields.value: Strikes at random enemies. Has an area of effect.

fields.name: Evolution
fields.value: Evolves at level 8 with **Duplicator** To make **Thunder Loop**

fields.name: Unlocks
fields.value: Unlocked by defeating a total of 5000 enemies.

fields.name: Leveling
fields.value:
(1) Base 
(2) Projectiles +1 
(3) Area +100%, Damage +10 
(4) Projectiles +1 
(5) Area +100%, Damage +20 
(6) Projectiles +1 
(7) Area +100%, Damage +20 
(8) Projectiles +1
